overview: Martyn King joined Zimo as Chief Operations Officer early in 2008, bringing vast experience gained over 25 years in the telecommunications industry. His ground-up career development started from a switching and transmission background as an engineer in BT during the 1980s. On leaving BT, he gained digital switching, transmission and submarine cable engineering skills in Cable & Wireless (Mercury) during the early to mid 1990’s. On leaving Cable & Wireless he developed his career into senior technical, service and network management positions with NTL and Ionica with key focus on delivering cable TV and telephony network architecture and centralised network management of switching and fixed radio access networks respectively. His senior management positions held within the last 8 years include responsibility for all core technical and service management teams for Redstone Telecom, and from 2001 he joined Band-X Ltd (now Invomo), where he held the position of CTO and Operations Director, and was responsible for the development and deployment of the company’s VoIP strategy.
